00038 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00039 #define MSGOBJ_NUMBER       32
00040 #define CAN_DLC             8
00041 #define CAN_DAT_MSG         0
00042 #define CAN_RMT_MSG         1
00043 
00044 #define FIFO_DEPTH          16  /* rx fifo-depth. */
00045 #define DIRn_RECEIVE        0
00046 #define DIRn_TRANSMIT       1

00048 #define IFn_TX              0
00049

00118 /* Exported typedef ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00119 typedef struct
00120 {
00121   dwformat_uWord arb_id;
00122   struct
00123   {
00124     u8  RTR;
00125     u8  EXT;
00126     wformat_uWord   DLC;
00127   } FMT;
00128   u8 data[CAN_DLC];
00129 } can_msgTypeDef;
00130 
00131 typedef union
00132 {
00133   /* message fifo paramters */
00134   u8 arr[FIFO_DEPTH][MSG_SIZEn];
00135   can_msgTypeDef  msg[FIFO_DEPTH];
00136 } can_msgfifoTypeDef;
00137 
00138 typedef struct
00139 {
00140   /* paramters */
00141   u8 rptr;
00142   u8 sptr;
00143   /* message buffer */
00144   u8 *buf;
00145 } can_queueTypeDef;
00146

00149 extern can_msgfifoTypeDef tmsgfifo;
00150 extern can_queueTypeDef recvQ;
00151 extern can_queueTypeDef sendQ;
